_header: Where I have chosen steadfast will I be
_description: To his mistress — two stanzas rhyme royal

CULFf16.First Lines:
Where y haue chosyn stedefast woll y beNewyeer to repente in wyll
                    thowth ne dedeyow to sarue watt ȝe commaund meneuer hyt withdrawe
                    for no maner drede…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…By promes made with feythful assuraunceEuer yow to sarue
                    withowtyn varyaunce
